Taxon name.Name: Fomitopsis palustris
Taxon name.Synonymy:
Current name: Fomitopsis palustris (Berkeley & M.A. Curtis) Gilbertson & Ryvarden 1985 MB#105322 
Basionym: Polyporus palustris Berkeley & M.A. Curtis 1849 MB#123013 
Obligate synonyms: 
   - Trametes palustris (Berkeley & M.A. Curtis) Ryvarden 1977 MB#324807 
   - Tyromyces palustris (Berkeley & M.A. Curtis) Murrill 1907 MB#472019 
   - Pilatoporus palustris (Berkeley & M.A. Curtis) Kotlaba & Pouzar 1990 MB#127493 
   - Postia palustris (Berkeley & M.A. Curtis) A.B. De 1995 MB#434476 
   - Fomitopsis palustris (Berkeley & M.A. Curtis) Teixeira 1992 MB#357807 
Taxonomic synonyms: 
   - Tyromyces ochraceivinosus Corner 1989 MB#136567 
   - Polyporus hypoxanthus Bresadola 1912 MB#154794 
         - Ganoderma hypoxanthum (Bresadola) C.J. Humphrey 1938 MB#267582 
   - Polyporus radula Lloyd 1918 MB#473546 
   - Polyporus paluster Berkeley & M.A. Curtis ? MB#214304

Restrictions on use: for commercial development a special agreement is requested
Nagoya protocol restrictions and complia: no known restrictions under the Nagoya protocol
